p: The extract was prepared using methods described by Stefanović et al. (2015) with slight modifications. The powdered plant material (leaves) was extracted by maceration with ethanol. Plant material (50 g) was soaked with 500 mL of ethanol for 24 h at room temperature and then filtered. The residue from the filtration was extracted again, twice, using the same procedure. The filtrates obtained were combined and then evaporated to dryness using a rotary evaporator at 40°C. The extract was stored in sterile tubes at 20°C until needed.
